vista.graph
Class ReferenceCurve

java.lang.Object
  vista.graph.GraphicElement
      vista.graph.Curve
          vista.graph.ReferenceCurve
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Animate, Bounded, Drawable
public class ReferenceCurve
extends Curve

A curve which can toggle between displaying and not displaying flags

Version:

Nicky Sandhu
